ingredients.ingredient: Â½ cup freshly squeezed lemon juice
1 stick unsalted butter, chilled and cut into small pieces

gear.name: Double boiler or heatproof bowl over pot

cookingTips: Infuse the sugar with elderflower gently to extract delicate floral notes without bitterness
Use gentle heat and constant stirring to cook eggs slowly without curdling
Strain the curd for a silky texture free of any cooked egg white bits
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This elegant preserve requires gentle handling and patience. Guide users through extracting subtle elderflower flavor, understanding the science of egg-based custards, and achieving the perfect spreadable consistency through slow cooking and whisking.
